item.title: Redis Analysis - Part 2: Simplicity
item.description:
Let’s talk about the simplicity of Redis. Redis was originally designed as a simple store, and it seems that its APIs achieved this goal. However, some of Redis internal design choices favored the simplicity of implementation over the ease of management.

So the question is - what simplicity means to you as a datastore user?
